google_play_reviews.content: I Was Aubrey Cottles Enforcer! It Makes Me So Proud To See Some Of My Brother's And Sisters I've Served In Anonymous With Still Repping Our Brand. Now I Want Me And Your App Developers To Campaine With Me On A One Of A Kind Website And App. For Those Of You Still In Support Of The Freedom Movement I Salute All Of You.. Gimme A Call Or Email Me When Yall Want To Put Some Work In With Me. Ya Boi Dante E. Sparda.. Do You Guys Still Serve Loyalty To The Anonymous? If So I'd Like To Promote Your App
google_play_reviews.replyContent: Thank you for downloading our app! We will keep working on it!

google_play_reviews.content: Keep up the good work brother Keep advancing forward

google_play_reviews.content: Click on nickname and does nothing won't allow me to enter nickname or go forward. Scanned add address page said not available. Can't add anyone
google_play_reviews.replyContent: How did you scan addresses if you couldn't enter your nickname? hehe

google_play_reviews.content: Texting good and files some times calls don't work. Maybe my internet is slow. PLEASE FIX THIS APP. ILL GIVE YOU 6 STARS IF YOU FIX THIS.. I love this app for what is made for. But lots of bugs. Can you please tell is there a recommened speed for this? Can some one please tell me more.
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Reporting bugs has to come with real information, saying "texting not good" does not help, especially knowing that texting and all functionality works just fine, also for using this app one should know about the limitations of using the Tor network for communicating p2p...
Thank you for your review

google_play_reviews.content: This app is amazing and super cool for anonymous communication.

google_play_reviews.content: Working great. Thanks for the prompt response
google_play_reviews.replyContent: We have not had this issue reported to us before, and we'd certainly like to work this through for you. Could you share the details at mr.s.xpress@gmail.com? And any relevant screenshots would be immensely valuable. Thank you.

google_play_reviews.content: Awesome app

google_play_reviews.content: Disappearing messages setting cannot be disabled. Is that a bug or that's how it is implemented? EDIT: I emailed you regarding it. I don't want my messages to disappear, all of my messages not just restricted to one or two. I can't go about pinning each and every single message. Got it, looking forward to it. Please just make sure there's one setting (or time) to never disappear the messages. ‚úåüèº
google_play_reviews.replyContent:
Use the pin to make a message not disappear later.
We might add a feature to configure the disappearing timer in conversation settings.

google_play_reviews.content: Thank you for your hard work. Im a fellow developer too. The app crashes during Tor initialization, which I cannot get past (SQLDatabase Null reference or whatever). This is probably due to Android 12. This app used to work on Android 10 which is why Im giving the 3 stars. Looking forwards to a hot fix.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: A new update of the app fixes this problem.

google_play_reviews.content: It is very good app it is best for chatting More reliable than other app

google_play_reviews.content: Great app for privacy, but when I call someone I cannot hear them at all. No video calling. They sometimes heard me, but I heard nothing on my end. I hear great from other messenger apps, no problem.
google_play_reviews.replyContent: You need to speak into the microphone, background noises will be blocked and unaudible, this app is the only app with calls over Tor, yes you can just use apps that are not anonymous...

google_play_reviews.content: App works perfect for intended uses. Definitely, my go-to app for encrypted messaging.
